doctor.name: Dr. Mazharul Haque
doctor.info: Dr. Mazharul Haque is a Gastroenterologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), MACP (USA). He is a Associate Professor, Dept. of Gastroenterology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Mazharul Haque at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 4:30pm to 10pm (Sat, Sun, Tue & Thu).
